ygData.subject: RE: Selo's bugged?
ygData.msgSnippet: For the longest time I noticed that our stamina bar will slowly drop if you start running around a lot in the same zone you logged into. As soon as you zone it
ygData.messageBody:
For the longest time I noticed that our stamina bar will slowly drop if you
start running around a lot in the same zone you logged into. As soon as you
zone it seems to correct this. Is this what you are referring to or do you
get this after you zone as well?

Good Journey

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Sunday, December 12, 1999 2:33 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Selo's bugged?


From: "Kenneth E. Bachman" <kbachman@...>

They seem to have fixed levitation, but I noticed that every time I
fired up Selo's and ran any distance of any sort, my fatigue bar started
to drop pretty rapidly. I didn't make any really long runs, but if I
have to start resting now when using our speed song, it's going to
really tick me off. Has anyone else noticed this?

Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
